values:
"Christmas makes you want to be with people you love"


"When you get bit by a snake, you're supposed to suck
the poison out.
That's what I had to do.
Suck all the poison out of my life."


"Just because it's Christmas - And at Christmas you tell the truth..." 


maybe they're right, maybe i do hold on to little grudges and maybe i am too stubborn.
isn't isolation supposed to fix everytihng?
this is one of those days that i am just really really ready to not be here.

I fucking hate when gas stations are like "door closed, use window" I'm like really? 
1. I dont eve know what i want, i need to make AT least three laps around the drinks, 3 laps around the candy, and then around the muffins\donuts\treats section. 
2. if i make the gas station guy go get whatever I want I feel like a rude jackass and like maybe I should tip him, but do you tip gas station guys? 
3. How bad am i going to feel if im like yeah can i have this and he goes to get it and they dont have it, and i ask for something else and they dont have that either, and it just keeps happening until finally i settle on something i can see through the window, like a jumbo sized card. 

 This happened to me at TWO gas stations tonight.

i am writing this post while i relax in bed, how? from my mindblowing wii!!! i really have no reason to leave my room ever again. well 2 reasons but nothing a snack supply and a catheter cant fix. so magical. okay i swore i would get up before 11 tomorrow so 1 more surgery and then sleep
i wish you and the drama brigade would just never utter my name.

Dear Summer, 
Please hurry the efff up and get here.

Dear Spring, 
You are such a tease. I kind of hate you.

this is like the 8th post i have started and i think im gonna stick this one out.

favorite things lately:

having class with jill and eating yummy pasta at bjs
movie nights with thomas, brad, lyns, and sus
my house being mostly clean
playing my drums
school going well
my treadmill
seeing my sister
hearing "it doesnt matter how late you get home i still want to see you"
diet pepsi and sour punch straws
salad
catching up with amy k
my plethora of tv shows im addicted to
that jittery feeling

Its amazing. you should all go buy it from target or itunes. its so so good. my favorite song is this one

"Turn On Me"

You can fake it for a while,
Bite your tongue and smile,
Like every mother does an ugly child.
But the stars are leaking out,
Like spittle from a cloud,
Amassed resentment counting ounce and pound.

You're entertaining any doubt,
Because you had to know that I was fond of you,
Fond of Y-O-U,
Though I knew you masked your disdain.
I can see that change was just too hard for us,
Hard for us.
You always had to hold the reigns,
But where I'm headed, you just don't know the way.

So affections fade away,
And do adults just learn to play
The most ridiculous, repulsive games?
On the faith of ruddy sons,
And the double-barreled guns,
You better hurry,
Rabbit, run, run, run.
'Cause meeting you was fun,
And there's a lot of hungry howlers in this one cell.
We're taking it over,
Their brittle, thorny stems,
They break before they bend,
And neither one of us is one of them.

And the tails will never mend,
'Cause you had it in for me so long ago.
Boy, I still don't know,
I don't know why and I don't care,
You don't hide me anymore,
If you'd only seen yourself hating me.
Hating me,
When I've been so much more than fair.
But then you had to lay those feelings bare,
One thing I know still got you scared,
You're all that cold iron,
And never once aired of our dead.

You had to know that I was fond of you,
Fond of Y-O-U.
So I took your lips at the time,
And to change like that is just so hard to do,
Hard to do.
Don't let it whip-crack your life,
And bow out from the fight,
'Cause oh, how your sisters will write.
The worst part is over,
Now, get back on that horse and ride.

GO BUY IT NOW

well my sunshine day was ruined when an 87 year old woman decided to hit my car and then hit a fire hydrant. luckily everyone is okay, my moms back is sore and my wrist hurts but thankfully neither of us were driving very fast so no serious injuries.

i told lyns yesterday that i was going to get in a car accident and that i had felt like i was going to for like months now. and right before the accident some other girl almost hit us when she took a turn super close and over the line and my mom was like gees! thanks for not letting her kill us. and then wham. 


if you thought my license plate was fucked up before, you should see it now.

this year has brought countless changes. really it has. especially the last half. i'm really looking forward to seeing what will develop this year and kinda excited for more change. hope everyone has loads of fun and is really safe.  and thanks for being in my life, all of you
robin hood prince of thieves keeps you up far too late. and kinda makes you want to punch christian slater. i have to get up at like 9ish. way harsh ty.
in case you didn't know, stress is the new sleep.

today i didnt work it was really weird because i worked like every sunday since june. 

i slept in! sat around watched tv, did loads of laundry, dishes, and cleaned my room. now im cooking dinner.

im finally uploading all of my cds that i lost when i transfered my music from the pc to the mac

it was rather warm today, someone is cutting their lawn and someone else is bbqing. Seasonally speaking, scent wise it is very confusing.

well back to my cleaning and domesticity.

that's right im currently watching anchorman and i have to say it is breathtaking. this is the first time i have watched it since i was high from spray paint and it was like 1230 am in cucks room, which was filled with a grayish haze. 

so my garage room in closer to being done but still not finished, hopefully next week. 
the closet shelving is partially done and im very excited because it feeds into my OCD quite nicely. 

i didnt do so hot my psych quiz but i dont really care at least now i know what my tests will be like now. i already started my reading for the next unit..GO ME! and i even went to geography today too.

Its official, my last day of work is october 7th. and i applied for two new jobs 

bleeee blarrr blarr. im excited for the snl premiere..riding the dane train. 

It seems like i have so much planned out up until like thanksgiving, but it seems like the days are passing so so slow. 

okay i think im going to go to bed even though i havent finished anchorman. work in the morning wooohooo. i basically love everything that comes out of steve carrells mouth. i leave you with some fantabulous quotes

i'm Ron Burgundy? 

i'm very important, i have many leather bound books and my apartment smells of rich mahogany. 

i could be wrong, but i believe diversity is an old, old wooden ship used in the civil war era.


loving you all.

debbie is my hero
im kinda a whole lot addicted to tv
i really dont do my psych homework and i really shouldnt be so lazy
but
tonight was a really really good night. i loved it

someone should buy me fight club on dvd so i dont have to watch it on vhs and i can watch it on my computer.

we finally ordered a new keyboard and i love it. love it.

i want to watch notting hill right now. which is weird. who wants to watch notting hill and fight club at the same time. so different.

i work at noon eff that. at least working at noon ensures my freedom at 9. 
then work 11 to 6 monday
tuesday babysit in the am and hang lout with noelle and mere
wednesday is going to own. me and debs movie day! 
and then closing like the whole rest of the week oh well.


tonight was weird but fun. mels= me so freakin hyper tonight.


well i must sleepeth. 


this was so pointless. im outrageous.
its funny when the choices you make give you the exact results you were trying to avoid.

so i got hired at BJS and today was my orientation. I shall be working the take-out counter 3 days a week, which means cutting my RL schedule back to 3 days and baby-sitting tuesdays. wooohooo.

my mom and sisters absence, my two jobs, and this whole apartment hunting crap i have been doing is making me feel freakishly adult-like, how gross.


so since last night i have felt like i had something stuck between my teeth i flossed last night, twice and came up with nothing. but it still felt like something was all up in there, until now. I just flossed and what should jump out but a chunk of either tooth of filling from a recent cavity i had filled. how great is that? it is horrible. now i have to go back to the MFING dentist. but i dont know if i can since our insurance changed thanks to the school district and my mom is gone and didnt finish the paperwork to complete the change or something. 

if i were an emo kid this is the point where i would make a remark about how the gaping hole in my tooth is like the hole in my heart. 

good thing im not an emo kid! 

well anyhoo in happier news i finally got my mood theme to upload but its notcomplete. 

and im going to go eat at murillos for kaycs birthday. even tho im not hungry in the slightest. yum

haha well its summer so of course im back on lj. i LOVE how it has the autosaved draft thing going on so it just loaded this:
"my friends are GREAT! mmm rivalry (12:08:41 AM): but if we hate eachother, i wish i were dead"

lol good stuff.

so yeah a brief life update...

graduation. i cired. knew that i would it was a really long shitty week the week before, not to mention stressful, so i knew things were just like welling up. i wasn't sad at all about leaving my friends, i mean i will miss them sure but i know i will see them all summer long and when i come home and its not like im going super far. i was mostly sad about leaving cuck, brown and mitsi. i felt kinda weird at first, ya know who misses teachers more than their friends but its different with them yaddida?


graduation party: yeah so my dad and his wife and my 2 lil sisters came over from AZ for the party. it was the first time my dad had seen anyone from his "previous life" in like 10 years. it was weird. can you imagine being friends with people and <U>completely</u> dropping them and then seeing them ten years later. it was weird and intense. went better than i expected. my mom freaked for  a few days prior and talked to the wife who was stuck surrounded by people im sure completely intimidated her while my dad talked to a few people. my mom and dad of course did not speak, but shared a <S>friendly</S> handshake when they left. other than that it was rather uneventful. except for you know dropping that they are probably moving to texas, because well arizona is apparently not far enough.

more ramble about the father: my sis and i decided we dont like the way they parent. after we had dinner with them and they were heading back to their hotel the first night hailey started to cry because she didn't want to leave us and they were like "omg hailey dont be so dramatic, get it together blah blah" im sorry she is seven years old and she hasnt seen us since december dont call her dramatic for being sad about leaving us once again. and the texas thing?seriously? seriously? 

 boys: HA. well boys will be boys i guess. they have the worst timing in the world and sometimes it just kills me.  kills me. but oh well i guess something cliche about things happening for a reason or something but ugh could boys occasionally grow up a little sooner or make decisions a little sooner or something?

sleep: well its summer so i dont sleep. and right now im watching ga wishing i had a mcdreamy hahaha.

okay...so we got all of our pictures back and I am so so so sad because a lot of em turned out all crappy and pixilated. But either way here they are...




this is the beach that our hotel in Waikiki was on.




this is all that separated us from our condo to the beach...also where I managed to find the only damn bee on the island to step on so it could sting my foot!




beach at the condo on maui




more beach from the maui condo



night time beach at maui



me and the grams on our sunset dinner cruise



mom and sis on the dinner cruise



I got REALLY REALLY bored after like 2 hours on the dinner cruise...



my sister hanging out with a sperm (whale) skeleton



me getting my tattoo..i kinda look like Frankenstein...and I am really really sad because the picture of me and the adorable guy that did my tattoo didn't come out at all! seriously tho i hearted him so so so much. His name was james and he used to live in berkeley and he was so so so cute. and cute little emo glases and lots of tattoos and made fun of me and wore a baseball shirt and listened to the pixies while he did my tattoo! and was just so flippin adorible!



my tattoo the day after i got it...it's on my right hip.



and last at the airport waiting for our delayed flight home. please notice, according to the sign, I am "snacks". Also, the hawaiian airports all say "toilets" instead of "restrooms"

Anyway that is kinda the trip in a nutshell.

i love salad and running.

i love pretending to have control

i love being a damn hypocrite

its so so so good. but tonight was so incredibly sad. debbie got me so hooked on tegan and sara Love pull your sore ribs in I will pull your tangles out In the back of your car I feel like I have traveled nowhere What will bring me home? What will make me stay, stay? What will bring me home? What will make me stay, stay? Well I don't know I don't know, ooh I don't know I don't know, ooh Everything in my body says not tonight Everything in my body says no Everything in my body says not tonight Everything in my body says no What will bring me home? What will make me stay, stay? What will bring me home? What will make me stay, stay? Well I don't know I don't know, ooh I don't know I don't know, ooh in honor of GA and the sadness.... nighttt

well it certainly has been quite some time. 

umm tournament sucked ass and i fear my temper..and both of laurens' the next time we saw the team from the tournament.specifically number 9. 
Fucked my knee some at the tourney and have to take the week off. So does shorty and apparently Gordon has banned both Shorty and I from playing saturday. NEAT. 
oh well new orthopedist a week from today.

in other news. matt and i are back together. weird i know. but things are going very very well this time. 

i totally forgot the point of this entry so im returning to my homework.

BTW if anyone has there damned TextReaderWorld notes from Spencers language packet i would love you to death if you gave them to me. k? k. thanks.

yeah. so today was quite obviously better than yesturday...how could it not be? I was planning on starting my AP for that long spence poem but i ended up downloading erm not illegally stealing all the songs from Grey's Anatomy last seaason. so so so many good songs. BTW deb im making you a cd. you should all watch the show!..if not for the awesome characters, the hospitalness, and the cute hunky doc, for the awesome music. well its about time for lost so im going to update my ipod and eat a scrambled egg sandwich. much love and a wish for a happy thrusday to everyone!

blardy blar blar. i could have sworn when i looked at my calendar this morning it said today was the 18 and i said mental note: wear POTC shirt tomorrow seeing as its the 19th. come to find out in  3rd period...it IS the 19th well. that blows talk like a pirate day for me. but i will make up for it seeing as myself and i few others are heavily lobbying for our theme to be shipwrecked. and by george it will be done. 


note to those reading: this doesnt mean im gonig to pull a danny\becky\whoever and rig the votes.
....at least not me personally...
just kidding..
sort of. 
mwhahaha..
i mean ::cough cough::: 
:::he he he he awkward laugh:::


anyway i forgot the point of this entry. it is sweltering in my house and yeah.

panoramas_wednesday
shirts=*you*cant*rock*it*like*this*like*the*chicks*of*06*

1. Reply with your name and I'll respond with something random about you.
2. I'll tell you what song/movie reminds me of you.
3. I'll pick a flavor of jello to wrestle with you in.
4. I'll say something that only makes sense to you and me.
5. I'll tell you my first memory of you.
6. I'll tell you what animal you remind me of.
7. I'll ask you something that I've always wondered about you.
8. If I do this for you, you must post this on your journal. You MUST

michael vartan......might very soon be moved to hate list!!! i never thought id say it..BUT...heres why.. The following is excerpts from the most recent watch with kristin.. by Kristin Veitch Parting Is Such Sweet Sorrow... Heartbroken. Shell-shocked. And just, well, sad. I've never approached a column feeling quite like this, which explains why I rewrote this paragraph nine times before I realized there's no easy way to say: Someone is leaving Alias. A main, integral character. Whatever salacious spin these mags may put on this person's exit, the truth is, this AWOL Alias star is leaving of his/her own will. So, let's try to keep the bitter rage to a minimum, mmm-kay? If he dies in the fucking car accident that ended season 4 i will flip the hell out ..find him on the street kiss him (b\c even with me enraged he is still beatiful) AND then SPIT ON HIM FOR LEAVING THE SHOW...and breaking my heart

yeah so i still havnt slept at all ya know. like not last night. and its hard to think lol but these are the icons i made last night and in the wee hours of this morning. 1. 2. 3. 4. 5. anyway im off. back to my phonecall.

well i survived the desert. and because i am so damn lazy and its almost 4 in the am (big shock) i am not reposting my trip thoughts\photos here. go look at my myspace bulletin. k? k. awesome. sounds grand. now im going to get back to making my bewitched and notting hill icons. mm as usual. fuck sleep.

i am supposed to be the child
borken in her arms
i cant handle the oppsoite.
a father, a best friend
and now another bestfriend
taken too soon by cancer
i cant look at her crumble


what would you possibly say 
if they put a number on your days
what if you took a step back
and realized itd never be okay?

Fuck sleep! Im going out sleepsless. i heart Dane cook and Wal Mart X 1231234983752983572983742983742984 Bajillion! hoollllllllllllllller x0x0x be safe on indepenDANCE day haha.  i think we should all dance. but of course INDEPENdantly. mm okay well yeah i have to pack...b\c im leave ..in like 4 or 5 hours hahaha.x0xfor reals this time



lol.. you like it rou--are we on comms?

people are SO fucking unappreciative. sometimes i wish i was more cold hearted. i know im not the nicest but sometimes i look back on certain opportunities i let pass and wish i was occasionally fucking cruel.Go fuck yourself. anyway im bored i leave sunday for a few days. down to ojai for a party and what not. hopefully a stop at disneyland. well im really really bored and i wish i could leave my house. oh well. so ABC announced alias would return oct 25 which makes no sense since thats not an effing thursday. but either way its either 111 days or like 129 days. either way WOOOHOO. im so watching season 4s first episode hehe. jealous much? hahahaha

Alias (tenatively) starts OCTOBER 6 AT 8PM!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! a.k.a Gala's B-day! Could I be any more excited? i so went to bed at like 1 woke up at 3 and havnt been able to go back to sleep ... so i did this... im trying to download liberty village from limewire right now haha.
well lj and lj buddies. i dont write in this too frequently. but i love it still  and love all you guys. wish me luck at camp..x0x0x

well its 1:42 in the am and it finally feel like summer lol. 
my nights are filled with  editing\organizing my itunes, watching my ALIAS and FRIENDS dvds non stop, raiding the cabinet\fridge because one needs food for energy when they dont sleep, and of course talking on the internet and waking people up via cellphone saying.."im bored..." 

my days are of course waking up in the pm STARVED, babysitting way too much yet not enough to have a constant flow of cash, and going to help  my mom with some awful project at cooper.

mmm summer. im so dreading camp like woah...you have no idea.

pretty much my history final was a big wast of time and student government was just pretty darn tasty. it was heeeeeeeeeeeccccccckkkkkkkkkkkkkaaaaaaaa sad tho. after the bell rang we were just standing there like ~~ahhhh this is the last time we are going to leave student govrnment!!!awwwwww~  it was mad crazy. im sure gonna miss my seniorsand i cant beleive we are going to be seniors!!! ewww\ahhhh that is scary!!!!!!! anyway more to come im sure ...have to go work on my chem final,.,..,

hmm...lets all take a gander at what time this post is being made at...yes i did just end a sentence with a preposition or something...get over it. in just a fews minutes i will be leaving my house for some B&E. thats right breaking and entering...into the school biotch. lets just say that tomorrow is like Bre-day...not wedensday or D-day. haha dont make fun of my spelling ..im running on negative sleep. anyway im off to commit crimes and hopefully single handedly (not really more like 6handedly) steal the votes and win the election by a landslide. spread the word biatches. lol vote for bre...she is awesome without sleep.



m o n s t e r = gooooooooooooooood!

p.s biOtch?
or biAtch?

i currently cant remember...p.p.s i jsut sneezed realy loud like donald duck hahahaha

today was one of the best birthdays i think i have ever had! Thanks mostly to....DEBBIE! MATTY! SHORTAY! LT! AMY! and MEGAN! and of course my mom and sister and gabe. my sister is giving me $100 and gabe is giving me money too whenever i decide to buy my video camera (which wont be till like july when im rich from babysitting again). haha. anyhoo my mom is taking me shopping tomorrow so that is super fly. my sugar high is dwindling so im gone. thanks again to all you cool cats i love you mucho!!!~

yum. well all of you are sitting your fourth period classes and i.....i am at home eating the other half of my sandwitch. my mom who bitched at me all last night about how i wouldnt be ready to leave. and wow. we are at home why? becasue she didnt pack. haha. anyway i hope you all have a B-E-A-UTIFUL WEEKEND. and my buds going to prom be safe and have fun!! x0x

well, i am not even really sure why I went to school today. LT and I didnt have to do the math portion so we spent the period laughing, drawing stick man cartoons, and getting sick on candy. NOT that it wasnt super fun..i just went to bed at 1am and would have liked to stay home and sleepin instead. Anywhooo there wasnt really much point to 3per History, I spent it talking to Erin and Jill and harassing Newman. Then english..rather boring and a wasted of time...tho i do love me some Will Smith. and finally chem ....i sat on bacligs counter and text various parties while some people played a game...again i ate too much candy. Me and MathewJohn went and bought the STAR WARS tickets (yay!) and then i went home and changed for the gym. LT and I had a wonderful time, we saw Cailey and Stovall. After we went and got a smoothie from the Nutrition Shoppe . 
I think it's about time for a nap.

i am six years old again
i can just feel it
the lies and next someone will walk away
families suck.
cool how when i get stressed i throw up.
cool how on my last day to sleep in i wake up at 7am! nothing woke me up, no alarm, no person, no barking dog. i just WOKE up. Wth?!!!?!?!!?!??!?

okay so can i just say i was so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so so happy when jimmy was on snl tonight. not to mention w\ Justin!!! ugh. so fantastic. 

anyway. so i pretty much got up at like 1pm today..did laundry watched some Friends season8...went and watched The National Arm Wrestling Championship @alexs with ian and shorty. it was so intense haha. then i went to the concert to watch samual be hard core. then went back to my casa to randomly watch snl. this is only the 3 episode i have watched this season and i am so glad i watched it. oh yeah and matty is home from the hospital.yay. i think i leave for LA on tuesday.  yay!!!

talkin bout issues
and cray cool medalions!!!!
talkin it up
on the barry gibbs talkshow!
haha well there is a first time for everything

im writing in this to avoid doing my stenberg essay. anything to keep from doing it. haha. so yeah. im so jealous of my friend..he has spring break this week. and i am stuck at school. i dont think we are going to get everything done in time for the film festival friday. ugh. i am super super stressed about everything. oh well.  i think i will jsut go to bed and do my essay in the morning...i still havnt done my spanish hw for tonight or last night. MEH!
